title: Single Page Resume
responsibilities: Developed a fully responsive single-page digital resume using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile viewing to enhance recruiter accessibility and engagement
Implemented semantic HTML and accessibility best practices to ensure WCAG-compliant design, improving usability for diverse audiences and aligning with industry standards
Optimized page performance and SEO, enabling instant load times, improved search visibility, and seamless recruiter access via a shareable web link

title: Immigration Agency Website
responsibilities: Built and deployed a fully responsive, client-facing immigration consultancy website with a modern UI, mobile-first design, and integrated booking system powered by Stripe
Developed a secure admin dashboard with role-based access to manage blog content, job postings, applicant data, and downloadable documents, including resume uploads and Excel export
Implemented a full job board and blog portal with search, filters, form handling, file management, and automated email notifications using Node.js, MongoDB, Cloudinary, and Nodemailer
